data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Al Bayda‘, Yemen to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Bayda‘, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Al Bayda'.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4760 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Al Bayda‘, Yemen a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Al Bayda‘, Yemen so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab, Iraqi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Iraqi people know you.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Al Bayda‘, Yemen that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Al Bayda' access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Al Bayda' to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Al Bayda'
location.cities_list: Al Bayda, Al Ghaylah, An Najd, Al ‘Aqabah, Al Qurayshīyah
